mapper.insert: insert into group_message (group_id, user_id, group_message_content, group_message_reg_date, group_message_mod_date) values(#{group_id},#{user_id},#{group_message_content}, sysdate(), sysdate())
mapper.select: select * from group_message inner join user on user.user_id = group_message.user_id where group_message.group_id = #{group_id} and group_message.group_message_id > #{criterionNumber} order by group_message.group_message_id limit 10
select count(group_message_id) from group_message where group_id = #{group_id}
